caption: The place is fantastic and spacious, the menu was delicious and the prices were very inexpensive. rapidly, efficient service and very welcoming staff members. Recommended.

Convenient location, fast, average pricing, good selection /variety, good service and great tasting food. I decided to take advantage of the available hot food buffet selection, and it was a definite win. Overall, I am satisfied and wouldn't hesitate to eat here again.

Extortionate prices for a simple sandwich, which was decent and quick however (turkey club). A few colleagues had the hot food that was available and mentioned that it wasn't very good. Unfortunately it was our only option during our visit to a neighboring building. If we had a better option we would have certainly gone somewhere else.

Sub par eating area for neighboring buildings. Overpriced food. I only write this review because after eating my joke of a Philly cheese steak... I realized it was actually the only item on the list of specialties worth the 6.99 I paid. The place likes cash over credit...and if you give them CC, they have to conveniently walk to the back into the mangers office to run the card. Unfortunately , this area of DC lacks any real good places to eat. Bon appetit!!!
